description: Get a list of workflow steps that are waiting for action for workflows in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: steps
nested_items.description: An array of the workflow steps that are waiting for action in your Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: stepExecutionId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies the workflow step that ran for the associated image build version.

nested_items.name: imageBuildVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image build version that ran the workflow.

nested_items.name: workflowExecutionId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies the runtime instance of the workflow that contains the workflow step that ran for the associated image build version.

nested_items.name: workflowBuildVersionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the workflow resource that ran.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the workflow step.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The name of the step action.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the workflow step started.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The next token used for paginated responses. When this field isn't empty, there are additional elements that the service hasn't included in this request. Use this token with the next request to retrieve additional objects.
